job title: Principal Software Engineer Marketing Platforms TurboTax
job description:
Overview

We hire those that:
  • Challenge themselves to be the best - through their hunger for technical and personal growth while creating world-class software
  • Are lifelong students, always learning from and helping evolve the people, processes, and product around them
  • Enjoy coaching others to do these same things
If that sounds interesting we would love to talk to you about being a Principal Software Engineer on the TurboTax.com team!

Responsibilities

You would:
  • Leverage your expertise to ensure we build bulletproof software that provides users with amazing, personalized digital marketing experiences
  • Rock the engineering mission, whatever it is, so long as youre empowered, can learn, can make things better, get to laugh a lot, and are recognized for your achievements
Qualifications

The essentials include:
  • Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or equivalent field
  • 10 years of professional experience in Web Application development
  • Expert proficiency with Java and JavaScript, plus expert ability to use the right language or tool for the job
  • Expert knowledge with Web SDLC, Service Oriented Architectures, and front-end technologies
  • Expert knowledge of modern front-end frameworks and Development patterns
  • Proven ability to influence and lead software initiatives that span multiple teams in a large organization
  • Strong knowledge of tag management systems, web analytics
  • A Quality mindset; what distinguishes good solutions from bad ones, and great solutions from good ones
Rockstars have:
  • Strong React, redux experience
  • Strong Amazon Web Services experience
  • Strong understanding of monitoring and managing webpage performance, AMP
  • Familiarity with marketing technology such as Adobe Audience Manager, Ensighten, Segment, Google Adwords, Google Analytics
  • Proficiency in CI/CD and automated pipelines (inclusive of methodologies and technologies)
